ticker.dx: - ((PLAYER_X - POS_X) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.1         + (RAIN * ( 0.075 + ( (0.075 + 0.06*CUSTOM) * pow(max(sin(0.05*AGE + CUSTOM*2*pi),0),2) ) ) + RAIN*0.1)*0.5
ticker.dz: - ((PLAYER_Z - POS_Z) / (DISTANCE_SQUARED + 1)) * min(max(2 - sqrt(DISTANCE_SQUARED), 0), 1) * 0.1         + ( RAIN * ( - 0.05 + ( (0.075 + 0.06*CUSTOM) * pow(max(sin(0.05*AGE + CUSTOM*2*pi),0),2) ) ) ) *0.75
